qrList.label: Set Character Gender and Type
qrList.message:
/setvar key=tags ["FHN", "FAN", "FBN", "FDHN", "FNHN", "FPN", "(WIP)", "MHN", "MAN", "MBN", "MDHN", "MNHN", "MPN"]|/len {{getvar::tags}}|/setvar key=l {{pipe}}| /len {{getvar::tags}}|/setvar key=l {{pipe}}| /setvar key=i 0|/setvar key=t none|
/while left=i right=l rule=lt {:/getvar key=tags index={{getvar::i}} | /setvar key=t {{pipe}} | /tag-exists {{getvar::t}} |/setvar key=e {{pipe}} |/if left={{getvar::e}} right=True rule=eq {:/tag-remove {{getvar::t}}:} | /addvar key=i 1:}|
/setvar key=sgender none | /setvar key=stype none | /setvar key=gender ["Female", "Male", "Machine"] | /setvar key=type ["Human", "Anthro", "Demi", "Beastkin", "Non-Human", "Pokémon", "Machine"] | /buttons labels=gender What gender is the character you are making? | /setvar key=sgender {{pipe}}|
/if left={{getvar::sgender}} right=Machine else={:/buttons labels=type What type of character are you making? | /setvar key=stype {{pipe}}:} rule=eq {:/setvar key=stype Machine:}|
/if left={{getvar::sgender}} right=Female rule=eq {:
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Human rule=eq {:
/tag-add FHN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Anthro rule=eq {:
/tag-add FAN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Demi rule=eq {:
/tag-add FDHN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Beastkin rule=eq {:
/tag-add FBN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Non-Hum rule=eq {:
/tag-add FNHN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Pokémon rule=eq {:
/tag-add FPN :} |
:}|
/if left={{getvar::sgender}} right=Male rule=eq {:
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Human rule=eq {:
/tag-add MHN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Anthro rule=eq {:
/tag-add MAN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Demi rule=eq {:
/tag-add MDHN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Beastkin rule=eq {:
/tag-add MBN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Non-Hum rule=eq {:
/tag-add MNHN :} |
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Pokémon rule=eq {:
/tag-add MPN :} |
:}|
/if left={{getvar::sgender}} right=Machine rule=in {:
/if left={{getvar::stype}} right=Machine rule=in {:
/tag-add (WIP):}:}|
/flushvar e|/flushvar i|/flushvar l|/flushvar sgender|/flushvar stype|/flushvar t|/flushvar tags|/flushvar type|/flushvar gender
